NLS1921.First Lines:
I was a[t erþeldoun]Wiþ tomas spak y
                    þare…
NLS1921.Last Lines: …A canaruwe oway he bareIn his eld wounde…
NLS1921.Note:
3344 lines in 11-line stanzas; ends imperfectly due to loss of most of
                    leaf, now a stub (f. 299ra).
